author: Vertyco
description: Set up and configure an AI assistant (or chat) cog for your server with one of OpenAI's ChatGPT language models, with configurable prompt injection, dynamic embeddings, custom function calling, and more
end_user_data_statement: This cog stores prompts and OpenAI API keys on a per server basis. If enabled, conversations with the bot are also persistently stored
install_msg:
Thank you for installing Assistant! type `[p]assistant` to see all commands.
You will need an api key **Per Server** for this cog. https://platform.openai.com/account/api-keys

**Warning**
It is not recommended to run this cog on a public bot as embeddings can use up a lot of space over time.

**Note**
This cog allows other 3rd party cogs to register functions with it, extending functionality. Be aware of what functions other cogs are registering with `[p]customfunc`
